title: Demand Response Device Schedule
description: Hilo Energie Inc - Demand Response Single Device Plan Schema (JSON v1)
$comment: Rel33.20240719 (This schema is not yet stable for v1)

eventId.title: Demand Response Event identifier
eventId.description: Hilo identifier for this Demand Response event. This will remain constant for the lifetime of the event.

lastModifiedDate.title: Last modified date of the event
lastModifiedDate.description: Date of last modification, or creation, of this event.

body.title: Demand Response message body, or Device Plan
body.description: The body of the CE message may contain one of the following types: EventScheduled, EventStarted, EventCompleted, EventCanceled, EventAmended, OptedOut. DevicePlan is used for external JSON plans, typically linked to via an Scheduled or Amended CE event.

parameter.title: Command parameter
parameter.description: The parameter to be sent to the device. The type of parameter depends on the command type.

start.title: Command start time
start.description: The time at which the command should be executed.

end.$comment: This field is not yet supported.
end.title: Command end time (optional)
end.description: The time at which the command should be completed. If not specified, the command is assumed to be instantaneous.

ParameterCustom.title: Custom Parameter
ParameterCustom.description: Custom parameter for given command type. Payload is arbitrary JSON.

ParameterNumeric.title: Numeric Parameter
ParameterNumeric.description: Numeric parameter for given command type

ParameterString.title: String Parameter
ParameterString.description: String parameter for given command type

ParameterBoolean.title: Boolean Parameter
ParameterBoolean.description: Boolean parameter for given command type

EventScheduled.title: EventScheduled
EventScheduled.description: A Demand Response event has been scheduled. The event will start at the given start time and end at the given end time.

start.title: Start time
start.description: The time at which the event will start.

end.title: End time
end.description: The time at which the event will end.

EventStarted.title: EventStarted
EventStarted.description: This Demand Response event has started.

start.title: Start time
start.description: The time at which the event started.

EventCompleted.title: EventCompleted
EventCompleted.description: This Demand Response event has completed.

end.title: End time
end.description: The time at which the event completed.

EventCanceled.title: EventCanceled
EventCanceled.description: This Demand Response event has been canceled.

end.title: End time
end.description: The time at which the event was canceled.

EventAmended.title: EventAmended
EventAmended.description: This Demand Response event has been amended. Either new and/or updated plan(s), or a device opt out list have been provided.

oneOf.title: Amendment of plans
oneOf.description: The plans for the event have been amended and/or new plans have been added.

oneOf.title: Opted-out devices
oneOf.description: List of devices that have opted out of the Demand Response event.

devices.title: Opted-out devices
devices.description: List of devices that have opted out of the Demand Response event.

DevicePlan.title: DevicePlan
DevicePlan.description: A Demand Response plan for a single device.

deviceId.title: Device identifier
deviceId.description: Target device identifier as defined by the integrator.

deviceType.title: Device type
deviceType.description: Type of device targeted by this plan. This is purely informational.

commandType.title: Command type
commandType.description: Type of command to be executed. This may provide information on how to interpret the command parameter.

commands.title: Command list
commands.description: List of commands to be executed in order of their timestamps. Array order is insignificant.

testMode.title: Test mode flag
testMode.description: If true, the device should not execute the commands but should instead perhaps log them. This is used for testing purposes, and is typically not used in production.
